meaningMnemonic: Because the hiragana ends with an う sound, you know this word is a verb. The kanji itself means <kanji>weave</kanji> so the verb vocab version is <vocabulary>to weave</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: When you have <vocabulary>to weave</vocabulary> the only thing you can weave is an <reading>O</reading> (お) shape. That's it. Just O's.
